socket_comunication_mss module

Project: Simulations for muSR data Analysis Industrial Placement Author: Paula Franco Date: February 2024

Summary:

Sockets are created and listens until the program is closes, here ports are descibed. The sockets recieve and send informtaion here.

socket_comunication_mss.close_socket_connection()[source]

Gracefully disconnects the socket from the client and closes the connection.

socket_comunication_mss.handle_connection_receive_thread(object)[source]

Establishes a connection to the client, prints connection details, and starts a thread to receive and process incoming messages.

Parameters:

handler (object) – An instance of a class that manages simulation parameters and states.

socket_comunication_mss.initialize_and_start_socket_server(host, Port)[source]

Defines and creates a global socket server,and starts listening for incoming connections.

Parameters:

  • host

  • port

socket_comunication_mss.receive_and_process_socket_message(object_of_class)[source]

Receives and interprets messages from a socket, then performs actions based on specific keywords.

Parameters:

handler (object) – An instance of a class that handles simulation parameters and states.

socket_comunication_mss.send_data(processed_data)[source]

send the processed simulation results to the client :param processed_data: The simulation results that have been processed and are ready to be sent to the client. :type processed_data: str

socket_comunication_mss.start_server_connection_thread(handler)[source]

Initializes the socket server, sets it to listen for multiple clients, and starts receiving and interpreting incoming messages from clients.

Parameters:

handler (object) – An instance of a class that manages UI elements and server settings.
